attributes.action: Limit class sizes to 30 children per qualified teacher and close the loopholes in current legistlation that allow this limit to be ignored.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Current legislation stipulates that there should be no more than 30 children in a class, each class having a qualified teacher.

My Local Education Authority has allowed a school to ignore this ruling by using a loophole that allows a Teaching Assistant to be classed as a qualified teacher for the purpose of this calculation.  Such loopholes need closing as the legislation is pointless otherwise.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
